title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million GBP, with a total of 12 data points.
Overall Revenue in million GBP has increased over the Year
Revenue in million GBP is roughly constant from 2008 to 2019.
The steepest stays the same occurs in between the Year 2016 and 2017.
Max Revenue in million GBP about 24082.0 was recorded at Year 2017, and 2019
Min Revenue in million GBP about 17840.0 was recorded at Year 2015
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million GBP, with a total of 12 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2008 to 2015.
But, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2017 to 2019.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2015 to 2017.
